title: Let's Go to the Open!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>The secret to streaming.... is that what you’re asking this Yohane about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes.... Your「Yohane and Rin’s Home」stream that you did with Rin was truly wonderful.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You saw that!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes. It was a really enjoyable stream that conveyed the charms of the two of you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>W-, well, it is something that this Yohane produced, so it’s only obvious! Even if the title of the livestream is kind of.... like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Umm, if you don’t mind, could you give me some advice as well? I want to tell people what I like, but I would also like to incorporate things that would make the people watching have fun. I wondered what I should do to make them happy, so I wanted to ask you, my great senior on livestreaming, Yoshiko-.... no, Yohane, about it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Fu.... If it’s a request from my little demon, I guess it can’t be helped. Umi.... show them your specialty! The viewers want to know more about you, they are interested in you, that’s why you need to put yourself out there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>My specialty.... Put myself.... out there. I understand! I’ll have a stream about the wonders of mountain climbing!! And my first guest will be you, Yoshiko!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eeeeeeh!? Me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Showing beginners the beauty of the mountains! That’s my specialty!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
